attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Public Transport fares have increased so much that it is now cheaper to use private vehicles.Thus increasing the amount of congestion on the road.Instead of picking on one the highest taxed motorists in Europe.Lower fares and get the motorist back on public transport.
But as this Goverment will not listen to the public.I will vote for the party which will reject any road pricing policy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
